mapper.select: SELECT a.enterpriseno, a.userat, b.enterprisename FROM tb_users_detail a left outer join tb_enterprises b on a.enterpriseno = b.enterpriseno WHERE a.userno = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_users SET userpassword = #{userpasswordnew}, updatedate = now() WHERE userno = #{userno} and userpassword = #{userpassword}
mapper.select: SELECT enterpriseno, enterprisename FROM tb_enterprises WHERE enterpriseat = #{enterpriseat} and enterprisename like '%${enterprisename}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_users SET userprofileimg = #{userprofileimg}, updatedate = now() WHERE userno = #{userno}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_questions WHERE userno = #{seq}
